text: Jahangir Butt (17 April 1943 â€“ 7 September 2021) was a Pakistani field hockey player. He was born in Gujranwala, Punjab, British Raj. He won a gold medal at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City, and a silver medal at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich. Butt died on 7 September 2021 in Karachi, Pakistan at the age of 78.Former Hockey Olympian Jahangir Butt passes away at 78 ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Pakistan Category:Olympic silver medalists for Pakistan Category:Pakistani field hockey players
title: Jahangir Butt
